content.query:
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://bank-raw-data@kraftsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/credit_history.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
)
WITH (
    customer_id VARCHAR(10),
    credit_score INT,
    num_credit_accounts INT,
    total_credit_limit DECIMAL(12,2),
    credit_utilization DECIMAL(5,2),
    num_late_payments INT,
    bankruptcies INT
) AS result;
